鏩字的基本解释

鏩
jiàn
〔鏩鏩〕锐进的样子。

鏩
zàn
古同“錾”。

鏩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《集韻》疾染切，上琰，從。］
见“鏩鏩”。
[②]［zàn］
同“鏨1”。
凿刻。

鏩字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏩； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1320第23
【集韻】疾染切，音漸。鏩鏩，銳進貌。【揚子·太?經】銳鏩鏩。【註】進無二也。　又【揚子·太?經】挫厥鏩鏩。【註】火性炎上曰鏩鏩。　又【集韻】鋤咸切，音讒。義同。

鏩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鏩字的起名意思

暂无。

鏩
Basic explanation of words
鏩
jiàn
〔鏩鏩〕 Looking sharply forward.
鏩
zàn
Ancient Tong "Chisel".
鏩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Jiyun" Jiran cut, Shangyan, from. ]
See "鏩鏩".
[②]［zàn］
Same as "Chisel 1".
Chiseled.
鏩
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏩; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1320 Page 23
【Jiyun】Dyeing and cutting, the sound gradually.鏩鏩, sharp and sharp appearance. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】rui 鏩鏩. [Note] Jin Wudu also.　[Yangtze·Tai? Classic] frustrated. [Note] On fire, it is said to be 鏩鏩.　 [Ji Yun] Pick salty cuts, sound slanderous. The same meaning.
